entry.title: Conflict between SWI1 and SOST
entry.content:
HI Friends

QM01 sends the email in German, and the document title/subject appears correctly in SWI1. However, in SOST, the document title/subject is displayed in English..

Is there any configuration between SWI1 and SOST.

 

Thanks with regards,

Vallamuthu M

entry.title: All infotype segments data should be sent when triggering RHALESMD for HRMD_A
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a requirement of sending HR masterdata via HRMD_A message type. I have configured most of the part and data is being sent.
One of my requirement is, I wat to send data based on change pointers. i.e. data should be sent for those employees who have been changed since last run. It is working fine too. But it is only sending changed data. I want all infotypes segments to be sent when I run program RHALESMD to send idocs for change pointers. 
Any idea on how to achieve this?

Regards
Param

entry.title: RAP : Managed with Unmanaged Save with Draft handling Create Mode issue
entry.content:
Hi All,
I have created a Managed app with unmanaged save having code to trigger BAPI to save transactional data.  I have added draft functionality to this app and all works find except for create mode. 

I am able to update root and dependent child node details successfully but when a new Document is created  the earlynumbering_create method is triggered twice and MAPPED table is populated twice.

Thus  cl_numberrange_runtime=>number_get returns 1 Doc # in first run [ Draft mode ]and second run [ After Save is Hit ], Next Document number is generated. This leads to issue that when Document is shown to user a Number is shown

On Save, next Docuement # is crated by method  earlynumbering_create

Could you please suggest if you have came across such issues and solution for the same. 

Thanks !!

entry.title: SAP BAdI ME_GUI_PO_CUST: How to Prevent '0' from Displaying in Custom NUMC Fields
entry.content:
I’m working on a line item enhancement for SAP Purchase Orders (eg: via BAdI ME_GUI_PO_CUST).
I’ve added custom fields of type NUMC (numeric character) to the screen.

The issue is: when the field is left blank by the user, it defaults to displaying a series of zeros (e.g. '0' ).

I’d like the field to appear empty (blank) instead of showing all zeros when no value is entered.

What’s the best way to achieve this?

Any advice or best practices would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!

ABAP Development   SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP MM Purchasing  ABAP Development  #SAP MM #Enhancements

entry.title: How to set up the device type used for 'MAIL' device in smartforms?
entry.content:
I am using a SMARTFORMS form to compose a mail. Therefore I set the DEVICE_TYPE of the output_options structure to 'MAIL'. 

In the resulting OTFDATA, I see that device type PDF1 is used:

Line 1: // XPDF1 0750 00000+00000+1 ....

Since PDF1 does not support all international characters, I want to use PDFUC instead. How do I set this up?

entry.title: F4 Value Help for Step Condition in Flexible Workflow – SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (Public Edition) and trying to add F4 / Value Help for a custom parameter (Purchase Group) in a Flexible Workflow step condition.

Requirement

  • Add a custom step condition in Flexible Workflow

  • Enable F4 value help for the condition parameter

  • Values should come from a custom source (CDS / OData)

What I Have Tried So Far

  1. Implemented the Flexible Workflow BAdI

    • IF_SWF_FLEX_IFS_CONDITION_DEF

    • Defined custom condition and parameter successfully

    • The condition appears correctly in the workflow configuration

  2. Tried using a Custom CDS View (Value Help type)

    • Created CDS view with required fields

    • Enabled it as a Value Help

    • CDS activates successfully

  3. Attempted to connect CDS via OData

    • Created OData service for the CDS

    • Tried to consume this OData in the BAdI for value help

❗ Issue:
At the final step, when trying to use the OData service inside the BAdI, the OData is not working / not accessible in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Because of this:

  • F4 help is not appearing in the workflow step condition

  • I am unable to bind CDS/OData as a value help source

My Questions

  1. Is it technically supported to provide F4 value help for Flexible Workflow step conditions in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?

  2. Is there any approved way to consume CDS or OData for value help in this scenario?

  3. If this is a known limitation, is there any recommended workaround?

Any guidance or confirmation would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance.

Best Regards,
Jeet Kanabar

entry.title: SEGW CREATE payload: distinguish property filled, possible or not?
entry.content:
I've got a SEGW project. In the CREATE method of the DPC_EXT class, is it possible to know if a property is transmitted in the JSON payload or not?

e.g. "AirlineCompanyName" transmitted:

{
  "AirlineCompanyCode": "LH",
  "AirlineCompanyName": ""
}

versus not transmitted:

{
  "AirlineCompanyCode": "LH"
}

In both cases, the method CREATE_entity_type gets an empty string for "AirlineCompanyName".

The client wants to have one logic if the property "AirlineCompanyName" is transmitted (empty), and another logic if the property is not transmitted.

Thanks.

Sandra

entry.title: How to store VA05 sales order list data into a custom Z table
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a requirement to store the sales order list data (similar to VA05 output) into a custom Z table for reporting and reconciliation purposes.

The VA05 transaction shows a combined view of:
Sales order header data (VBAK)
Item data (VBAP)
Schedule lines (VBEP)
Business data (VBKD)
Status information (VBUK/VBUP)

My questions are:
Is it recommended to capture VA05 output directly, or should the data be read from the underlying tables (VBAK, VBAP, VBEP, VBKD, etc.)?
Is there any BAPI or standard function module that returns the complete VA05 dataset suitable for mass extraction?
What is the best-practice approach to design a Z table structure to store VA05-like data?
Header + Item in one table?
Separate header and item Z tables?
How do SAP standard programs usually handle such requirements (e.g., snapshot reporting, audit, historical reporting)?

I understand that VA05 is a reporting transaction and may use internal logic rather than a single SELECT statement.
I want to follow SAP-recommended design, especially with respect to performance and data consistency.

Any guidance or references would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Update Bank Detail with results were not as expected
entry.content:
Hi expert,
I have problems with update bank details with class: cl_md_bp_maintain 
With coding as:

data:
  lds_bnk_data  type bus_ei_struc_bankdetail,
  lds_bnk_datax type bus_ei_struc_bankdetail_x,
  ldt_bnk       type bus_ei_bupa_bankdetail_t.

loop at pit_bp_pymt assigning field-symbol(<lfs_bp_pymt>).
  append initial line to ldt_bnk assigning field-symbol(<lfs_bnk>).

  <lfs_bnk>-task = <lfs_bp_pymt>-status.     " I: insert, U: Update, D : delete

  <lfs_bnk>-data_key = <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_id.

  if <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_ctry is not initial.
    lds_bnk_data-bank_ctry = <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_ctry.
    lds_bnk_datax-bank_ctry = 'X'.
  endif.

  if <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_key is not initial.
    lds_bnk_data-bank_key = <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_key.
    lds_bnk_datax-bank_key = 'X'.
  endif.

  if <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_acct is not initial.
    lds_bnk_data-bank_acct = <lfs_bp_pymt>-bank_acct.
    lds_bnk_datax-bank_acct = 'X'.
  endif.

  <lfs_bnk>-data = lds_bnk_data.
  <lfs_bnk>-datax = lds_bnk_datax.

  clear:
    lds_bnk_data,
    lds_bnk_datax.
endloop.
pos_partner-central_data-bankdetail-bankdetails = ldt_bnk.

With recent BP: 1001250 have bank detail: 

ID           | Ctry      | Bank Key          |  Bank acct
0001        VN         ABC_123456      123456789 
 
Case 1: Update data with data wrong 
Status = U                             " Update 
ID = 1
Ctry = VN
Bank key = ABC_654321 
Bank acct = 123456789
=> Result: SAP return result success and BP will insert line with data update to BP
    => Why class  cl_md_bp_maintain  not inform error if not get  line ID: 1 to Abaper? Instead of SAP was insert line ID: 1 to data BP

Case 2: Delete data with data wrong 
Also BP have data before update case 1 But not update, I will delete line 
Status = D                          " Delete
ID = 1
Ctry = VN
Bank key = ABC_654321 
Bank acct = 123456789 

=> Result: SAP return result success and Bank detail will have same data before run delete.
    => Why class  cl_md_bp_maintain  not inform error if not get  line ID: 1 to Abaper? 

I was suprised the result of all case. Please, explain my code is wrong, where?
Thank you,
